start.paragraph: This completes your secure access to this service.

no-cases-found.paragraph: There are no cases associated with this email. Please check you used the correct email, and access this service again via the IMA start page.

cannot-use-form.paragraph-1: You can only continue your claim if you are in the UK.

risk-of-harm.header: Would you be at risk of serious and irreversible harm in {{values.country-placeholder}}?

harm-claim-countries.header: Which countries can you make a serious and irreversible harm claim against?
harm-claim-countries.paragraph: Your Illegal Migration Act notice will say which countries you can make this type of claim against. You cannot make a claim against your country of nationality

confirm.submit-warning: You will not be able to change your answers after you submit.
